encodingDesc.p: The following text is encoded in accordance with EpiDoc standards and with the CTS/CITE Architecture.

div.p:
Vide lib. 2, cap. 58, Retractationum, tom. i, col. 654, averbis, Interea (a) liber, usquead
verba, Fratres dilectissimi. M. (a) Proxime ante recensitis libris de Anima et ejus origine, deque Adulterinis Conjugiis, qui !UM-i ad annum 411? peiu­
nenl, significat jam Augustinus a se conseriptos per idem fere lempus fuisse subsequentes contra Adversarium Legis et
rrt)plwtaru.1I libros. Hujus operis cum laude ineminit Cassiodorus in lib. de InsLitulione divinarum Uuerarulu, cap. i. Ca­
pila liitri Adversarii singula, quæ re.ellenda hicfuerunt, recensentur aute Gaein libri i, ill cap. to.
